Activity: Arrive, grab coffee. Catch up on tech news from various sources including The Verge and Wired.
Address any code review comments from yesterday's commits. Refactor code as needed.
Begin developing the trade routing module. Implement logic for selecting the appropriate exchange or venue for order execution.
Research and evaluate different order routing algorithms. Consider factors like latency, fill rate, and market impact.
Lunch break. Grab sushi with the team.
Implement a basic order routing algorithm based on the research findings. Focus on simplicity and efficiency.
Integrate the trade routing module with the order management system. Ensure that orders are routed correctly based on the selected algorithm.
Write unit tests for the trade routing module. Ensure that the routing logic is functioning correctly and that orders are being routed to the appropriate venues.
Conduct a code review with @sdev-1 to get feedback on the trade routing module.
Wrap up for the day. Commit changes, and make a note of feedback from @sdev-1 for tomorrow's improvements.
